name: Project API Key
help: API Key to an Edge Impulse project. The project needs 'anomaly' and 'no anomaly' classes in the test set, and have access to FOMO-AD.

name: Image sizes
help: Comma separated list of image sizes to try.

name: Model types
help: Comma separated list of FOMO-AD model types to try (valid: transfer_mobilenetv2_a1, transfer_mobilenetv2_a35).

name: Model capacities
help: Comma separated list of FOMO-AD capacities to try.
